newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: IPCL shares face suspension in 5 days.
newsitem.headline: IPCL shares face suspension in 5 days.

text.p: The New Zealand Stock Exchange said on Monday that Independent Press Communications' (IPCL) exchangeable shares in Independent Newspapers Plc would be suspended within five days unless IPCL provided the exchange with its preliminary announcement for the year to December 31.
Listing rules require companies to report their annual results within 75 days of balance date.
IPCL was the subsidiary and bidding vehicle of INP in last year's successful takeover of New Zealand publisher Wilson and Horton. -- Wellington newsroom 64 4 473-4746
